Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I'm 31 and my ob/gyn is suggesting I get a mammogram because of a lump I found in my breast. He said it could be fibrocystic breasts or a tumor. Anyone that has had it, is it as bad as everyone says it is. Any advice would be appreciated. Thanks, Melinda
Posts.Title: 31 and need a Mammogram

Posts.Content: Hello All: Had mammo done and it turns out that all I have is fibrocystic breasts. I thank the heavens above. Thanks all for caring and wish everyone good luck and are in my prayers. Melinda
Posts.Title: 31 and need a Mammogram
